Strong information technology professional with a Master of Business Administration - MBA focused in Finance from K.S. School of Business Management.

PositionHistory.Title: Data Researcher I
PositionHistory.Description:
Department: Market Intelligence (Entity Management)
Responsibilities:- * Responsible for the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of relevant data published in SNL products for the information tracked by the respective department. (Worldwide coverage of company). * Worked on Identification of Duplicate Record of Entities and Funds Records both on CIQ & SNL end through research & content collection. * Deletion of Duplicate Records of Entities and Funds both on CIQ & SNL end using various process like GenericB, West, WestX, Deletion Utility Tool, Remote Machines, Microsoft SQL Sever, MS Excel & MS Outlook * Providing employee training and development within the department to increase subject matter expertise. * Handling client questions and provided comprehensive responses * Provided suggestions on improving the data set collection techniques, accuracy and audits in case of red flags for error prone data set.
